The Museum of Contemporary Art (MoCA) in New York announced today that it is partnering with the National Endowment for the Arts (NEA) to create the annual, $10 million National Endowment for the Arts (NEA) Scholarship for Young Art. Applicants will be selected via a multi-tiered application process, in partnership with the NEA, which will be hosting the 2019 awards at the museum. The final four finalists will be chosen by the NEA, which will receive a total of $9.7 million.
